title.line1: The safest cloud storage for all

subtitle.line1: Syncing, backing up and sharing your files in total privacy couldn’t be easier.
subtitle.line2: With Internxt Drive we focus in a user-friendly encrypted storage with military-grade
subtitle.line3: encryption, so only you have the control over your files and data.

subtitle.line1: Securelly access all your files from
subtitle.line3: any kind of device with connection to
subtitle.line4: internet via the most secure cloud

subtitle.line1: Internxt Drive lets you organize your
subtitle.line2: files in folders, rename them and filter
subtitle.line3: list of files to find what you want faster.
subtitle.line4: You can even backup your computer
subtitle.line5: folders like your documents folder, so
subtitle.line6: you always have the most recent
subtitle.line7: changes of your most important files.

subtitle.line1: Internxt Drive focuses on privacy and
subtitle.line2: security, so you only have to focus on
subtitle.line3: what matters to you, like sharing files
subtitle.line4: with your coworkers, or the photos of
subtitle.line5: your last travel with your family. You
subtitle.line6: choose with who you want to share
subtitle.line7: them and how many times you want

subtitle.line1: Now you can keep the last version
subtitle.line2: of that super important project you
subtitle.line5: all of them safe in your Internxt Drive.

subtitle.line1: Privacy and security are our core, we don’t run our business on data or advertising,
subtitle.line2: but on trust. We respect your rights and build amazing tools around them, not against.

card1.title: Military-grade encription.
card1.subtitle: We take your privacy very seriously, that’s why your photos are encripted so only you can access your photos.

card2.title: Zero-knowledge technology.
card2.subtitle: We never store or transmit files, user passwords or encryption keys in an unencrypted or unhashed form.

card3.title: Privacy by design.
card3.subtitle: We develop our products with the user in mind, and it’s privacy is a must in the data driven world we live in.

card4.title: Secure from the core.
card4.subtitle: As security flaws and scandals are the daily news, we make sure our systems keep your data and files safe from attackers.
